headline: Mastercard (MA): Valuation Check After New $14 Billion Buyback, Dividend Hike and Digital Payments Partnerships
summary: Mastercard (MA) just checked several big boxes for long term investors by rolling out a new $14 billion share repurchase plan and lifting its quarterly dividend by 14%, while also deepening partnerships in fast growing digital payments. See our latest analysis for Mastercard. Those capital return moves have landed just as Mastercard sits near all time highs, with the share price at $571.93 and a roughly 9.5 percent year to date share price return. Its three year total shareholder return above...
